description: Architecture and landscape architecture students are exposed to a wide range of contemporary and emerging concepts and methods such as ecological planning and design, landscape ecology, ecological urbanism, designing for resilience, regenerative design, climate sensitive urban design, etc. At the same time, new techniques and tools are also being developed, such as in remote sensing, visualization and representation techniques, etc. that are increasingly being used in the landscape architecture practice. These highly specialized topics are offered in this module to provide students with a deeper understanding of these areas.
title: Topics in Landscape Architecture 6
